comment: Professor Sligh is fine. I just felt like someone could have handed me the book and told me to read it and I would have gotten the about as much out of it as I did the class. Not much communication, and test questions sometimes seemed to be pulled from nowhere. I'm sure she's nice, and she's not difficult, I just wish I learned more.

the class was easy, but there was weeks where she wouldn't communicate at all. it was easy to figure out what was due, but sometimes she would forget to upload lectures or reading assignments. there was quizzes, discussions, exams. the exams were easy, but they're lockdown and you have to remember specific things from her lectures and the TED talks

Professor Sligh is the sweetest. I took Infant Development with her, and I am so thankful I did. Not only is her class so interesting, she makes it so easy to get an A. There are 4 open-book Unit Tests, 12 quizzes based off article readings, and 4 discussion posts. She creates study guides for each unit test and hold study sessions beforehand!

I've had bad instructors but his one is the best with my freshman history one. I love psyc but it's memorization heavy, important stuff can be self-taught. Really lenient. Has good stories. Grading makes me copy and most stuff is pointless but she's a really good instructor only came for the A. Wish she was my mom sorry I like her so much. Weird :)
Great teacher, she is really understanding and friendly. One quiz a week but they are very easy. Lockdown but no camera. I would take her again if I could!

She was great! She has a great presentation style and highlights the key info in the material. Relevant and interesting bc we all develop across the lifespan. Her tests were a little tricky so don't be fooled. She's kind and very knowledgeable but you have to study the slides, read the material and think it through to do well on her tests.

Prof. Sligh is very understanding and nice! It was an in-person lecture but attendance was not mandatory and you could basically do everything online. Psychology has always been a breeze for me personally but the material itself is easy enough that anyone could pass. Sligh is a great prof and makes this easy class easier!!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: This lady is AMAZING! We had 4 exams, 12 quizzes, she dropped 4. The quizzes are from readings and videos, but they're straightforward. We had 2 journals, as long as you do what she's asking you'll received full credit. She's so sweet and an all around great professor. This was my second time taking her and I'm taking her again in the fall.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Professor Sligh is an extremely sweet person. She's really funny and her class isn't very difficult. We had 4 exams, and we had these assignments called developing lives that came with the textbook which were graded. Other than that, she just lectures off of power points. Usually ends class early.

Professor Sligh is seriously the sweetest person ever! She is very real and keeps her lectures interesting and to the point. If you listen in class and do the study guide there's no reason you shouldn't get an A in her class. I would take her over 100 times again

She is amazing. I have taken her multiple times already and am taking her again next semester! She makes class interesting and fun and tries to make it relate to you or something you could identify with. Tests are all multiple choice and are not that bad. Also, there were online chapter quizzes but all the answers are on quizlet.

The easiest class and professor I have ever had, HANDS DOWN. The vocab quizzes are so easy you dont even have to study to get a 100. Exams are straight from the notes with maybe 2 or 3 from the textbook. You dont have to show up to get an A in the class.

I actually enjoyed this subject so I read the text but Im not even sure I needed it? Her PowerPoints were like, straight from the text. One might tire of her stories but I always felt that they connected to the material and they never bored me. I really enjoyed this class and you could too! And if you dont care about it, take it cuz its easy-ish

She is the sweetest lady ever. Lectures aren't mandatory, but she makes them very interesting. 4 vocab quizzes and 4 one-page reflection, easy 100's. You actually have to study for those, use quizlet and the slides. I never used the book, but if you want the textbook I would recommend renting it.

I love this professor she is very caring and personable. There are 4 vocab quizzes (made 100 on all 4),and 4 non-cumulative exams, and 4 journals. This is a simple class, she makes it enjoyable, not stressful at all. I would strongly recommend her, this was an easy course.

Professor Sligh is amazing! She's really nice and you can tell she enjoys what she teaches. She makes everything easy to understand. There's no homework, just vocab quizzes that are easy, a few tests, and a 1 page journal entry after the test. She's great!

Professor Sligh was absolutely amazing! I loved her class so much. Many people say it's an easy A, which is true, but it's a class you thoroughly enjoy. You have vocab quizzes, tests & short journal entries. She wants the class to be something you enjoy & she has such a passion for the subject. I would take her for everything if I could!

EASY A ! This class was easy BUT I actually learned. She has a lot of knowledge and she loves her job. This class made me think about life deeper and I learned many new things. Great class and professor. Work is manageable and barely in homework besides studying for tests!

Easy Class. 4 test all multiple choice, 4 vocab quizzes, and 4- 1pg journal assignment about your life. posts all powerpoints online. don't bother buying textbook because all vocab words are on quizlet word for word. jokes a lot and makes class relatable. allows to make up test/ quizzes

I love Dr. Sligh on a personal level. She is really sweet and funny. I found her lectures to be a bit all over the place, but at least its not boring. To do well on exams, read the textbook and review her powerpoints together. All labs are online and you only have to write two lab reflections/reports. Overall, not too bad!

Professor Sligh is such a great professor. If you need a class to boost your GPA, this one is an easy A! There are 5 vocabulary quizzes and 5 exams. There are 1-page journal entries due after each exam. She makes the class very easy and is very lenient with grading. Get the book! You need it for vocabulary and studying for the exams.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring--Would take again

comment: Allison was absolutely amazing. She really knows what she's talking about. There are three papers, they're one page and super easy. There's also 5 vocab quizzes (super easy) and 5 exams and a final, the exams are easy just study a quizlet, (there're a bunch made for her class). Great professor would highly recommend.

She's really easy. I never studied for tests and got all A's, and her final is optional, online, and only to replace your lowest test grade. Everything's based out of the book, and her slides she goes over in class are posted online. I never skipped class, but you'd be fine if you did. Her quizzes are vocab quizzes word for word and matching.

Take. Her. !!! Prof. Sligh is amazing. Tests are straight from the PowerPoint with 5 questions from the book. Vocabulary quiz and journal with each test which are both just easy grade boosters. Drops the lowest test grade so do good on the tests during the semester and you dont have to take the final. Easy A
Shes so so so sweet and funny. Her tests are kind of hard if you do not study. You have to write a short journal article after tests. But overall its a very easy class and shes a wonderful lady.
rating_tags: Tests? Not many--Amazing lectures--Would take again

comment: Sligh is a great professor! There are 4 or 5 vocab quizzes and "journal" entries (both are easy 100s). The tests are not difficult, I studied the night before and made As and high Bs on all exams.. Skim through the book and her powerpoints, memorize the vocab and you're good. Would love to take her again! Horrible at returning grades on time though

she does vocab tests, exams and journals. The journals and vocab are easy so make sure you get an 100 on those because the tests are rather difficult. She will work with you, she is an amazing teacher and very funny.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures

comment: Dr. Sligh is the most caring professor I've had for the past 3 years. There are 4 tests, 4 vocab quizzes and 4 journal assignments. The journal assignments are simple and the vocab quizzes are STRAIGHT from the book and sometimes she has the term in the definition. The tests are not easy A's, you actually need to study and know whats happening.

Super funny and gives great examples of the concepts covered in the class. Very personable and laid back. Tests seem a bit more difficult than the class but her journal assignments are super easy and you will get an A as long as you do them. Read over the PowerPoints and her notes she adds at the bottom.

She is the sweetest lady, has 3 kids of her own and relates her personal experiences to what you're learning. She makes you want to be your best friend. You will have one vocab quiz, one test, and a one page essay for each chapter. The vocab quizzes and essays are ridiculously easy but you NEED to study for her tests.
LITERALLY JUST TAKE HER OMG!!!!!! THE BEST

Prof. Sligh is honestly one of the easiest psychology professors I have taken, which is great if you are a nursing major or a psyc major trying to take it easy for a semester. Her tests and quizzes are easy and you have a paper, which honestly I got a 105 on because I turned it in early. Just show up to class, look at the ppt, and you'll get an A.

She was honestly the easiest teacher I have ever had. She was super laid back and funny. If you want a seriously easy A register for her class. just show up to class pay attention and theres no way you wont make an A.       TAKE HER!!!!!!!!
Easy. Never cracked open the book. Purely lectures. Test, SIMPLE vocab quizzes, 1 paper. Didn't even study. She's like your friend's mom; she's nice.

Would recommend taking her. You will learn a lot from this class in general. Probably one of the sweetest ladies I have ever met, always willing to help her students. Vocab quizzes should be easy 100's if you make flashcards and study. The questions at the end of the book in chapters helped me alot on the test. You have to read to pass this class.

TAKE PROFESSOR SLIGH! She's seriously the sweetest, quirkiest professor I have had at Kennesaw. I've gone to her office hours a couple times to review what I missed on the tests even though I did well; she seemed to like that I cared about my grades and the class a lot. She's super approachable if you have questions about your grade & very helpful!

Such a sweet prof. Posts powerpoints online and a good portion of the tests comes from the textbook so you as long as you review the powerpoints and read you don't really need to go to class. 4 Vocab Quizzes, 4 Tests, a short paper, and an online final. Would definitely take her again!

She's the nicest teacher I've had in a while. Professor Sligh is constantly cracking jokes and trying to engage her students. You can tell that she cares about her classes and is willing to change the schedule to make things easier for everyone. We definitely need more professors like her on campus!

Best psych professor ever! She puts the power points online and rarely ever says something thats not on them. 4 tests and 4 vocab quizzes. I never studied for a vocab quiz and got a 100 on all of them (extremely easy). With tests, she creates a study guide, so theres no need to go to class. Only one paper on a fun topic and grades very easily.

Professor Sligh is the cutest, sweetest professor ever! She knows her stuff and she is awesome.  Vocab quizzes are super easy, tests are a little hard, and the paper was relatively easy.  The final is online. 10/10 recommend this awesome lady :)

Dr. Sligh is awesome! She tells a lot of personal stories with lectures and makes them interesting. Her tests are a lot harder than you'd expect, but just read the ppt, book, and study guide she creates and you should do fine! I've made B's on all the in-class tests and A's on the vocabulary quizzes. The final is online (no lockdown browser). She offers 10 pts. in extra credit on our paper (which is really easy) and is willing to work with students. She curved the first test 4 pts also. I'll most likely be getting an A in the class. Take her!

I loved Dr. Sligh, she's amazing! She's so passionate about what she is teaching. She actually puts the lectures into terms where students understand. She assigns vocabulary quizzes that are easy A's and the tests are straight forward. For sure take her!
Mandatory attendance or lose points daily.  Unbelievable ammount of homework and pop quizzes each class.  Her tests are ridiculously hard.  Stay away.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Dr. Sligh is very upbeat! She keeps her course interesting by including Brain Games videos and TED Talks. She is flexible and willing to help. You'll enjoy this course with her and will enjoy the material.

Loved Dr. Sligh! Very willing to help you out and is very understanding. She keeps her lectures interesting and understandable with videos, especially Brain Games episodes. And if you're a psych major, you must love Brain Games. I would definitely take her again.

Sligh was great. She is friendly and funny but she does take a while to post grades. She seems to only post grades when on campus and that is only once a week before or after class. Assignments are well explained and she is a fair grader. There are vocab quizzes and tests (multiple choice) each module. I would definitely take her again.

I liked her but it took forever for her to grade. She only seems to be on campus twice a week, and doesn't add our grades to D2L even if she has the tests right there, until two weeks later. Her exams were quite hard, and her lectures are not that informative; you'd do it yourself by reading the powerpoints. I don't think I'll take her again.

She is the sweetest woman ever! All we had were vocab quizzes (50 words matching for each unit), cog labs, reflection papers (short and easy), and tests. She's VERY lenient on due dates and grading however the tests were a bit difficult but I never read the book. She will make extra credit opportunity if needed! LOVED HER!

TAKE DR. SLIGH!! She's one of my favorite professors I have had so far in college. Psychology is a fun class anyways but she makes it even better. Gives extra credit, lectures are funny, she tells awesome stories. Very clear about what the tests will cover. Great teacher!!
Dr. Sligh was a great teacher! All her tests are from the book and power points, study them and you'll be fine.  She is so funny and very understanding and willing to work with you.

I LOVE professor sligh. She is so sweet and funny and she made this class so interesting. Her tests weren't that bad as long as you memorize the vocab and understand her power points. One paper to write but it wasn't bad. Definitely recommend her

I took her hybrid class and it was interesting. First test she made up herself, put things on there that weren't in the book, but she curved it. The rest of the tests were questions FROM ONLINE. Literally go to google. type in the question..and there it is. VERY easy if she continues to do that. I only went to class 4 times.

She is hilarious! Super easy class. I never went to class, but when I did it was really just to hear her ramble like a crazy lady and get a few laughs. All tests are online and she is a pushover so if you want bonus points, basically just tell her and you will get them. Super easy! Everyone take!

this class was ridiculously easy. she doesn't take attendance, i took a hybrid class so it was only once a week as is. All test are online and the answer were definitely not difficult. If you didn't get an A in here you put forth NO effort. She's a really nice lady, she just says "um" alot. and talks about her kids. alot.

This class was a joke. If you didn't make an A, you just didn't care. It was a hybrid, all tests online and we got tons of bonus points. The professor is definitely a character.. I would recommend her!

The class is easy, but the teacher is horrible, very unclear, and says um over and over! I counted 187 times one day. Tests are online so they arent bad, just read. Going to class is pointless. Overall class is easy professor is annoying and seems lost!
Easy teacher.  Reads straight off the powerpoints, which she puts on WebCT, so not much effort has to be put into the class.  Not the easiest A, but not the hardest either.

Easiest 3000 level psyc class ever! She talks about her kids a LOT, but she's sweet and helpful. Interesting class overall.. tests are all m/c and one SHORT paper, not bad at all! I would take her again if she taught anything else!
very laid back and nice . willing to help whenever she can even with her kids around!! take her!
Awesome professor! She is helpful and very funny in class. You must read the book and study, but as long as you do the work you should get an A no problem. I highly suggest her to anyone!
She likes to talk about her kids a lot...and thats ok! She is super nice and helpfull. I wished she tought more than just social psyc.

Laid back teaching style and very helpful. Attendance not manditory but be sure to read the text throughly because the exams can be somewhat difficult. Professor Sligh has a great personality and in my opinion is TOTALLY hot !

Very nice and funny. The material is pretty much common knowledge and straight forward for a 300 level psychology course. The four tests are a little difficult but the two papers and extra credit will help boost your grade. Pretty easy A or B if you read the book! Also, attendance is not required.

Great Class .. Dr. Sligh is a very nice professor to take. Her teaching style is laid back, but informative. The exams are quite in depth though, so while attendance is not mandatory, you definately need to read and study the material.

Professor Sligh is the best! She is very nice and understanding. She has a great personality. She gives tuns of examples in her lectures from everyday life which makes her class interesting, enjoyable, and the material easy to learn. I wish she taught more classes.... she also has a great sense of humor!!!

This was my favorite class of the semester and she did a nice job of relating the material to everyday life. Tests are fairly easy (posts ppt/notes online), two short essays, and attendance isn't required. She is very understanding and willing to help. Class is mostly discussion-based. Easy and fun! I would recommend her to anyone! Very nice.

Take this prof if you'd like to learn and get an A. She's great with working with students and helping them. Professor Sligh uses daily life with her family as illustrations for subject matter. Personally - she has a fantastic laugh and smile. Resembles Mindy from the old "Mork and Mindy" show.
